tool_description: Get Google Search results in JSON format. This API allows users to customize their search results based on various parameters such as country, language, and the number of results.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Retrieve search results for a specified Google search keyword query. Users can customize their results using various parameters.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The search keyword for the query.

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return. If not specified, defaults to 10.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Defines how many results to skip. For example, to get the second page of results, use start=10. If not specified, defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: html
optional_parameters.description: Option to retrieve the full HTML of the Google search results page.

optional_parameters.name: uule
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the location for the search results using Google's UULE parameter. Users must calculate UULE themselves.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Full name of the language for the search results (e.g., English, Spanish).

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the device type for the search results, either 'desktop' or 'mobile'. Defaults to 'desktop'.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Full name of the country for localized search results (e.g., United States, Canada).
